TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ApplicationSettingsBase extends System.Configuration.SettingsBase implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged
Public MustInherit Class ApplicationSettingsBase Inherits SettingsBase Implements INotifyPropertyChanged
public ref class ApplicationSettingsBase abstract : System::Configuration::SettingsBase, System::ComponentModel::INotifyPropertyChanged
type ApplicationSettingsBase = class inherit SettingsBase interface INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: 作为派生具体包装类以实现 Window 窗体应用程序中的应用程序设置功能的基类。

span.span: Acts as a base class for deriving concrete wrapper classes to implement the application settings feature in Window Forms applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将以下功能添加到了类, 该类由基于 Web 的应用程序使用: adds the following functionality to the class, which is used by Web-based applications: - 检测派生的设置包装器类的属性的功能。The ability to detect attributes on a derived, settings wrapper class. 支持用于包装类属性的声明性模型, 如稍后所述。 supports the declarative model used for wrapper class properties, as described later. - 更高级别和方法。Higher-level and methods. - 其他验证事件, 可对其进行处理以确保各个设置的正确性。Additional validation events that you can handle to ensure the correctness of individual settings. 在应用程序设置体系结构中, 若要访问一组设置属性, 需要从派生具体的包装类。In the application settings architecture, to access a group of settings properties you need to derive a concrete wrapper class from . 包装类的自定义方式如下:The wrapper class customizes in the following ways: - 对于每个要访问的设置属性, 会将相应的强类型公共属性添加到包装类中。For every settings property to be accessed, a corresponding strongly typed public property is added to the wrapper class. 此属性具有`get`读`set` /写应用程序`get`设置的和访问器, 但只有只读设置的访问器。This property has `get` and `set` accessors for read/write application settings, but only a `get` accessor for read-only settings. - 相应特性必须应用于包装类的公共属性, 以指示 settings 属性的特征, 例如设置的范围 (应用程序或用户), 该设置是否应支持漫游, 该设置的默认值为设置、要使用的设置提供程序, 等等。Appropriated attributes must be applied to the wrapper class's public properties to indicate characteristics of the settings property, such as the setting's scope (application or user), whether the setting should support roaming, the default value for the setting, the settings provider to be used, and so on. 每个属性都是使用或指定其作用域所必需的。Each property is required to specify its scope, using either or . 如果使用了默认值 , 应用程序范围的设置为只读。Application-scoped settings are read-only if the default is used. 类使用反射在运行时检测这些特性。The class uses reflection to detect these attributes at run time. 此信息的大部分传递到设置提供程序层, 后者负责存储、持久性格式等。Most of this information gets passed to the settings provider layer, which is responsible for storage, persistence format, and so on. 当应用程序具有多个设置包装类时, 每个类都定义一个*设置组*。When an application has multiple settings wrapper classes, each class defines a *settings group*. 每个组具有以下特征:Each group has the following characteristics: - 一个组可以包含任意数量或类型的属性设置。A group can contain any number or type of property settings. - 如果通过使用修饰包装类来显式设置组名称, 则会自动生成一个名称。If the group name is not explicitly set by the decorating the wrapper class with a , then a name is automatically generated. 默认情况下, 所有基于客户端的应用程序都使用来提供存储。By default, all client-based applications use the to provide storage. 如果需要备用设置提供程序, 则必须使用相应的修饰包装类或属性。If an alternate settings provider is desired, then the wrapper class or property must be decorated with a corresponding . 有关使用应用程序设置的详细信息, 请参阅[Windows 窗体的应用程序设置](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-for-windows-forms.md)。For more information about using application settings, see [Application Settings for Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/application-settings-for-windows-forms.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用应用程序设置来持久保存主窗体的以下属性: 位置、大小、背景色和标题栏文本。The following code example demonstrates the use of application settings to persist the following attributes of the main form: location, size, background color, and title bar text. 所有这些属性都`FormSettings`作为类中的单个应用程序设置属性保留, 分别名为`FormBackColor` `FormLocation`、 `FormText` `FormSize`和。All of these attributes are persisted as single application settings properties in the `FormSettings` class, named `FormLocation`, `FormSize`, `FormBackColor` and `FormText`, respectively. 除`FormText` 和`Size`之外的所有数据都绑定到其关联的窗体属性, 并使用应用默认设置值。All except for `FormText` and `Size` are data bound to their associated form properties and have a default setting value applied using . 该窗体包含四个具有以下名称和函数的子控件:The form contains four child controls that have the following names and functions: - 一个名`btnBackColor`为的按钮, 用于显示**颜色**通用对话框。A button named `btnBackColor` used to display the **Color** common dialog box. - 一个名`btnReload`为的按钮 , 用于应用程序设置。A button named `btnReload` used to the application settings. - 一个名`btnReset`为的按钮 , 用于应用程序设置。A button named `btnReset` used to the application settings. - 一个名为`tbStatus`的文本框, 用于显示有关程序的状态信息。A textbox named `tbStatus` used to display status information about the program. 请注意, 每次执行应用程序后, 会在窗体的标题文本后附加一个句点字符。Notice that after every execution of the application, an additional period character is appended to the title text of the form. 此代码示例需要一个具有名为`colorDialog1`的类的窗体 和一个具有名`tbStatus`为的控件。This code example requires a Form with a class named `colorDialog1`, and a control with a named `tbStatus`. 此外, 它还需要三个`btnReload`名`btnReset`为、 `btnBackColor`和的对象。Additionally, it requires three objects named `btnReload`, `btnReset`, and `btnBackColor`. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

related.span: Windows 窗体的应用程序设置

span.span: Application Settings for Windows Forms

summary.span: 初始化 类的实例。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 将 类的实例初始化为其默认状态。

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class to its default state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无参数构造函数的设计目的是, 假设没有与从派生的当前设置包装器类相关联的组件。The parameterless constructor was designed to work under the assumption that there is no component associated with the current settings wrapper class, which derives from . 创建包装类的实例时, 继承的代码将自动执行以下操作:When an instance of a wrapper class is created, inherited code will automatically perform the following actions: 1. 在类上反射。Reflect over the class. 2. 对于标记`[UserScopedSettingAttribute]`为或`[ApplicationScopedSettingAttribute]`的包装上的每个属性, 将创建相应的。For each property on the wrapper marked with either `[UserScopedSettingAttribute]` or `[ApplicationScopedSettingAttribute]`, a corresponding is created. 3. 每个属性都具有一些属性, 这些属性基于其他属性设置, 这些属性可在包装器的属性中显示, 例如默认值或设置提供程序。Each has some of its properties set based on other attributes that are optionally present on the wrapper's properties, such as the default value or the settings provider. 4. 所有其他特性只会置于特性包 ( 类的属性) 中。All other attributes are simply put into an attribute bag, the property of the class. 5. 所有对象均添加到 由类的属性表示的。All objects are added to a represented by the property of the class. 然后将此集合传递给方法。This collection is then passed to the method. 如前面提到的步骤3中所示, 本机使用几个属性属性, 具体如下: 、和。As implied by step 3 mentioned previously, natively works with several property attributes, specifically the following: , , and . 所有其他设置属性只会传递到适当的基础提供程序。All other settings attributes are simply passed through to the appropriate underlying provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数与使用调用的构造函数完全等效:This constructor is exactly equivalent to the constructor using the invocation: `ApplicationSettingsBase(owner, String.Empty)` 有关如何在包装类的实例化过程中使用反射的信息, 请参阅默认构造函数。For information about how reflection is used during the instantiation of a wrapper class, see the default constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数将属性初始化为`settingsKey`参数的值。This constructor initializes the property to the value of the `settingsKey` parameter. 此属性在歧义同一应用程序域中设置包装器类的不同实例时非常有用。This property is useful in disambiguating different instances of the settings wrapper class in the same application domain. 有关如何在包装类的实例化过程中使用反射的信息, 请参阅默认构造函数。For information about how reflection is used during the instantiation of a wrapper class, see the default constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由参数指定的对象充当此应用程序设置类的当前实例`owner`的所有者。The object specified by the `owner` parameter acts as the owner of the current instance of this applications settings class. 在从派生的设置包装类的初始化过程中, 将查询所有者的站点。During the initialization of the settings wrapper class derived from , the owner's site is queried for a . 如果存在, 则它将优先用于包装类的所有属性的本机设置提供程序 (由指定)。If one exists, it is used in preference to native settings provider for all the properties of the wrapper class, as specified by the . 此构造函数将属性初始化为`settingsKey`参数的值。This constructor initializes the property to the value of the `settingsKey` parameter. 此属性在同一应用程序域中歧义包装类的不同实例时非常有用。This property is useful in disambiguating different instances of the wrapper class in the same application domain. 有关如何在包装类的实例化过程中使用反射的信息, 请参阅默认构造函数。For information about how reflection is used during the instantiation of a wrapper class, see the default constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Context As SettingsContext
public: virtual property System::Configuration::SettingsContext ^ Context { System::Configuration::SettingsContext ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与设置组关联的应用程序设置上下文。

span.span: Gets the application settings context associated with the settings group.
A associated with the settings group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个从派生的设置包装类都具有与之关联的上下文。Each settings wrapper class derived from has a context associated with it. 上下文会传递到每个属性的设置提供程序, 以标识属性的使用方式。The context is passed to the settings provider for each property to identify how the property is used. 因此, 上下文将作为提示, 以帮助设置提供程序确定如何最好地保留关联的应用程序设置值。Context therefore acts as a hint to help the settings provider determine how best to persist the associated application settings values. 与此相反, 属性使设置提供程序能够消除同一个包装类的多个实例的歧义。In contrast, the property enables the settings provider to disambiguate multiple instances of the same wrapper class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在应用程序的新版本安装过程中迁移应用程序设置时, 方法通常与方法结合使用。The method is often used in conjunction with the method when migrating application settings during the installation of a new version of an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性 (也称为索引器) 通常用于派生自的设置包装器类。 The property, also known as the indexer, is routinely used in the settings wrapper class derived from . 将包装类的公共属性绑定到相应的设置属性。 binds the public property of the wrapper class to the corresponding settings property. 根据正在执行的操作引发若干事件: raises several events depending on the operation being performed: - 第一次检索属性时, 将引发事件。The first time a property is retrieved, the event is raised. - 如果设置了属性, 则会引发事件。When a property is set, the event is raised. 如果处理程序不取消事件, 则设置属性值并引发事件。If the handler does not cancel the event, then the property value is set and the event is raised.

exception.span: 没有与当前包装关联的属性，或者未能找到指定的属性。

span.span: There are no properties associated with the current wrapper or the specified property could not be found.
An attempt was made to set a read-only property.

exception.span: 在设置操作期间，所提供值的类型与设置属性不兼容。

span.span: The value supplied is of a type incompatible with the settings property, during a set operation.
The configuration file could not be parsed.

span.span: The source of the event.
A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Properties As SettingsPropertyCollection

summary.span: 获取包装中的设置属性的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of settings properties in the wrapper.

value.span: 一个 ，包含当前包装中使用的所有 对象。

span.span: A containing all the objects used in the current wrapper.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性`get`的访问器反映了设置包装类 (派生自) 的元数据以动态确定可用的应用程序设置属性集。The `get` accessor of the property reflects over the metadata of the settings wrapper class, which is derived from , to dynamically determine the set of available application settings properties. 类本身识别应用程序设置的某些特征, 例如其名称、属性类型、设置提供程序、默认值、只读状态和序列化首选项。The class natively recognizes certain characteristics of an application setting, such as its name, property type, settings provider, default value, read only status, and a serialization preference. 这些特征作为类中的属性进行镜像。These characteristics are mirrored as properties in the class. 设置属性的所有其他特性只传递到其关联的设置提供程序。All other attributes of the settings property are just passed through to its associated settings provider.

exception.span: 未能找到关联的设置提供程序，或者其实例化失败。

span.span: The associated settings provider could not be found or its instantiation failed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PropertyChanged As PropertyChangedEventHandler

summary.span: 发生在更改应用程序设置属性的值之后。

span.span: Occurs after the value of an application settings property is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当通过方法的 访问器更改设置属性,或在调用或方法时还原的每个属性,`set`都会引发事件。The event is raised when a settings property is changed through the `set` accessor of the method, or for every property that is restored when a call is made to the or methods. 此类没有对应`PropertyChanging`的事件; 改为查看事件。There is no corresponding `PropertyChanging` event for this class; instead, see the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property PropertyValues As SettingsPropertyValueCollection

summary.span: 获取属性值的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of property values.
A of property values.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Providers As SettingsProviderCollection

summary.span: 获取包装所使用的应用程序设置提供程序的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of application settings providers used by the wrapper.

value.span: 一个 ，包含当前设置包装的设置属性使用的所有 对象。

span.span: A containing all the objects used by the settings properties of the current settings wrapper.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 确定设置包装器类或单个设置属性所使用的设置提供程序。The determines what setting provider is used by a settings wrapper class or an individual setting property. 如果未指定此属性, 则客户端应用程序将使用。If this attribute is not specified, a client application will use the .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Reload() cil managed

summary.span: 从永久存储刷新应用程序设置属性值。

span.span: Refreshes the application settings property values from persistent storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会清除当前缓存的属性值, 导致这些值在以后被访问时从持久性存储重新加载。The method clears the currently cached property values, causing a reload of these values from persistent storage when they are subsequently accessed. 此方法执行以下操作:This method performs the following actions: - 它通过清除属性表示的集合来清除当前缓存的属性。It clears the currently cached properties by clearing the collection represented by the property. - 它为集合中的每个成员引发事件。It raises the event for every member of the collection. 与中的比较, 前者将加载最后一组保存的应用程序设置值, 而后者将加载保存的默认值。 contrasts with in that the former will load the last set of saved application settings values, whereas the latter will load the saved default values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了在事件处理程序的正文中调用的方法, 该方法是`btnReload`名为的按钮。The following code example shows the method being invoked in the body of the event handler for a button named `btnReload`. 此调用的结果是, 将应用程序设置的当前存储值重新加载到相应的属性中。As a result of this call, the currently stored values for the application settings are reloaded into their corresponding properties. 类概述中列出了完整的代码示例。The full code example is listed in the class overview. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#6)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 将保持的应用程序设置值还原为其对应的默认属性。

span.span: Restores the persisted application settings values to their corresponding default properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通过还原每个应用程序设置的当前保持值来覆盖用户范围的设置属性。The method overwrites the user-scoped settings properties by restoring the currently persisted value of each application settings. 此方法执行以下操作:This method performs the following actions: - 它在支持此可选方法的每个设置提供程序上调用方法。It calls the method on every settings provider that supports this optional method. - 它调用方法来强制刷新设置属性值。It calls the method to force a refresh of the settings property values. 与中的比较, 前者将加载最后一组保存的应用程序设置值, 而后者将加载保存的默认值。 contrasts with in that the former will load the last set of saved application settings values, whereas the latter will load the saved default values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了在事件处理程序的正文中调用的方法, 该方法是`btnReset`名为的按钮。The following code example shows the method being invoked in the body of the event handler for a button named `btnReset`. 作为此调用的结果, 存储的应用程序设置的默认值将重新加载到其相应的属性中。As a result of this call, the stored default values for the application settings are reloaded into their corresponding properties. 类概述中列出了完整的代码示例。The full code example is listed in the class overview. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#5)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#5)]

span.span: The configuration file could not be parsed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Save() cil managed

summary.span: 存储应用程序设置属性的当前值。

span.span: Stores the current values of the application settings properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将每个设置属性的当前值写入其关联的数据存储区。The method writes the current value of each settings property to its associated data store. 对于每个属性, 此方法在关联的设置提供程序上调用方法。For each property, this method calls the method on the associated settings provider. 此方法与基类实现的不同之处在于, 它在写入值之前会引发事件。This method differs from the base class implementation in that it raises the event before the values are written. 如果仅定义的设置是应用程序范围的设置 , 则不会产生任何影响, 并且如果使用默认值调用, 则不会返回错误。If the only settings defined are application-scoped settings, will have no effect and return no error if called with the default . 仅保存用户范围的设置。 only saves user-scoped settings. > [!IMPORTANT] > 没有相应的 Load 方法, 因为应用程序设置的值会在包装类初始化期间自动加载。There is no corresponding Load method because the values of application settings are automatically loaded during wrapper class initialization. 与此相反, 当应用程序结束时, 这些值不会自动保存。In contrast, these values are not automatically saved when an application ends. 因此, 你必须显式调用方法以保持应用程序设置的当前值。Therefore, you must explicitly call the method to persist the current values of the application settings. 这通常在主或包含 的事件处理程序中执行。This is typically performed in the event handler of the primary or containing . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了从主窗体的事件处理程序中调用的方法。The following code example shows the method being called from the event handler for the primary form. 此方法还会在与窗体的属性关联的 settings 属性后面追加一个附加句点。This method also appends an extra period to the settings property that is associated with the form's property. 类概述中列出了完整的代码示例。The full code example is listed in the class overview. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#3)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SettingChanging As SettingChangingEventHandler

summary.span: 发生在更改应用程序设置属性的值之前。

span.span: Occurs before the value of an application settings property is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生在应用程序设置值属性通过方法更改之前。 The event occurs before an application setting value property is changed through the method. 当调用或方法时, 不会引发此事件。This event is not raised when the or methods are called. 可以通过事件数据类取消。 can be canceled through the event data class. 通常使用事件来处理单个设置属性的立即验证。You typically use the event to handle immediate validation of an individual settings property. 有关验证的详细信息, 请[参阅如何:验证应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-validate-application-settings.md)设置。For more information about validation, see [How to: Validate Application Settings](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-validate-application-settings.md). 此类没有对应`SettingChanged`的事件; 改为查看事件。There is no corresponding `SettingChanged` event for this class; instead, see the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示类型`FormSettings`为的对象的事件处理程序, 它是从派生的包装类。The following code example shows the event handler for object of type `FormSettings`, which is a wrapper class derived from . 处理程序将事件信息显示在名为`tbStatus`的文本框中。The handler displays the event information in a textbox named `tbStatus`. 类概述中列出了完整的代码示例。The full code example is listed in the class overview. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#7)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#7)]

related.span: 如何：验证应用程序设置

span.span: How to: Validate Application Settings

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SettingsKey { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SettingsKey : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置应用程序设置组的设置键。

span.span: Gets or sets the settings key for the application settings group.

value.span: 一个 ，包含当前设置组的设置键。

span.span: A containing the settings key for the current settings group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供此属性是为了使客户端代码 (尤其是设置提供程序) 能够区分同一应用程序设置类的多个实例之间的歧义。The property is provided to enable client code, and in particular the settings provider, to disambiguate between multiple instances of the same application settings class. 除非使用单独模式设计设置包装器类, 否则单个应用程序中可以有多个相同应用程序设置类的实例。Unless the settings wrapper class is designed using the singleton pattern, there can be multiple instances of the same application settings class in a single application. 的值应根据要共享的属性值的方式进行设置。The value of should be set according to how the property values are intended to be shared. - 如果要在同一应用程序中的包装的所有实例之间共享包装的设置属性, 则所有实例都应具有相同的值。If the settings properties of the wrapper are intended to be shared across all instances of the wrapper in the same application, then should have the same value in all of the instances. 这是类的默认行为。This is the default behavior of the class. - 如果包装的设置属性应为每个实例, 则每个实例都应具有唯一的值。If the settings properties of the wrapper are intended to be per instance, then should have a unique value for every instance. 使用构造函数的 版本可以初始化为唯一字符串。The version of the constructor enables you to initialize to a unique string. 与此相反, 属性向设置提供程序提供提示, 使其能够以有效且有序的方式持久保存值。In contrast, the property provides hints to the settings provider to enable it to persist values in an efficient and orderly manner. 类包含一个类似的属性, 可帮助标识事件的源。 The class contains a similar property that helps identify the source of the event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SettingsLoaded As SettingsLoadedEventHandler

summary.span: 在从存储区中检索应用程序设置之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after the application settings are retrieved from storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件仅在第一次`get`访问所使用的第一个配置属性后发生, 通常通过方法。 The event occurs only after the initial `get` access of the first configuration property used, typically through the method. 后续访问使用本地缓存的设置属性的值。Subsequent accesses use values for the settings property that are cached locally. 和方法将清除所有缓存的值, 以便在后续属性访问时再次引发此事件。The and methods will clear all cached values so this event will be raised again upon subsequent property access.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SettingsSaving As SettingsSavingEventHandler

summary.span: 发生在将值保存到数据存储区中之前。

span.span: Occurs before values are saved to the data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件由方法引发, 然后将应用程序设置属性存储到其关联的数据存储区。The event is raised by the method before it stores the application settings properties to their associated data store. 关联的事件处理程序可以取消此事件。The associated event handler can cancel this event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示类型`FormSettings`为的对象的事件处理程序, 它是从派生的包装类。The following code example shows the event handler for object of type `FormSettings`, which is a wrapper class derived from . 处理程序将查询用户以保存当前的应用程序设置属性值。The handler queries the user to save the current application settings property values. 类概述中列出了完整的代码示例。The full code example is listed in the class overview. [!code-cpp[AppSettingsSample#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/cpp/AppSettingsSample.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[AppSettingsSample#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/CS/AppSettingsSample.cs#8)] [!code-vb[AppSettingsSample#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AppSettingsSample/VB/Form1.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Upgrade() cil managed
abstract member Upgrade : unit -> unit override this.Upgrade : unit -> unit

summary.span: 更新应用程序设置，以反映最近安装的应用程序。

span.span: Updates application settings to reflect a more recent installation of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法执行两个操作, 以确保平滑过渡到新版本的应用程序:The method performs two actions to assure smooth transition to a new version of an application: - 它通过调用方法通知所有相应的设置提供程序是否存在已升级的应用程序, 前提是它们已经实现了接口。It notifies all of the corresponding settings providers of the existence of the upgraded application through a call to their method, assuming they have implemented the interface. 如果设置包装类标记有, 则不执行此操作。This action is not performed if the settings wrapper class is marked with . - 它重新加载所有应用程序设置的值。It reloads the values for all of the application settings. 您可以重写的默认行为 , 以实现自定义升级或合并行为。You can override the default behavior of to implement custom upgrading or merging behavior. 使用方法检索应用程序以前版本的设置的各个值。Use the method to retrieve individual values for a setting for the previous version of the application. 自定义升级行为的示例包括:Examples of custom upgrade behavior include: - 使用新的策略默认值覆盖以前的一个或多个用户指定的值或以前的默认值。Using new policy defaults that override one or more of the previous user-specified values or previous defaults. - 要与较新范围、其他设置属性组等兼容的旧值的特殊翻译。Special translation of old values to be compatible with newer ranges, a different settings property group, and so on.

span.span: The configuration file could not be parsed.
